A teacher computed the average score of students in a given test. The result of the computation describes
explanation: Data refers to raw facts or figures that have not been processed in data processing. When these facts or figures are processed, they become information, which has more meaning than the raw data. Therefore, the result of the computation, which is the average score, is information because it has been processed from the raw test scores.

text: A company has four computer system, one printer and one scanner for its daily operations. One factor that can motivate the company to connect all the devices in a network is the need to
explanation: In an ideal world, efficient work means achieving maximum productivity with minimum wasted effort. When it comes to maximizing customer service productivity, streamlined customer interactions and cost-effective software are your best friends.

text: The process of copying data or information form the internet to a personal computer is termed
An entrepreneur who wishes to send digital data over a telephone line would need a
explanation:
Modem:It standsfor Modulator-Demodulator.
It is a device that helps computers send data over the telephone or cable and also allows a computer or another device, such as a router or switch, to connect to the Internet.
It can also convert digital data from a computer or other device into an analog signal that can be sent over standard telephone lines.

text: Graphical User Interface is considered user friendly because of the following reasons except that it

options.A: compels the user to learn all the command before operating the system
options.B: displays all the actions available to the user for easy access.
options.C: is easier for user to operate and understand
options.D: makes the icons and menu familiar to the user

explanation: A graphical user interface is a visual way of interacting with a computer using items such as windows, icons, and menus, used by most modern operating systems. It allows users to interact with electronic devices through graphical icons and audio indicators such as primary notation, instead of text-based user interface, typed commands and labels, or text navigation.

explanation: ^ in MS excel means exponential so "A = A20^3" = 5^3 = 125 ( since A20 = 5)

explanation: Data manipulation language(DML) statements or commands are used for managing data within tables. A data manipulation language is a computer programming language used for adding(inserting), deleting, and modifying(updating) data in a database.

explanation: A distributed database is basically a type of database which consists of multiple databases that are connected with each other and are spread across different physical locations. The data that is stored in various physical locations can thus be managed independently of other physical locations.
